title: Night, Silence, Desert
data: Night, Silence, Desert (Persian: شب، سکوت، کویر) is a collaborative album by Iranian musician Kayhan Kalhor with Mohammad Reza Shajarian and others, released on 12 September 2000 in the United States through Traditional Crossroads records.[1] All music is composed by Kayhan Kalhor This 2000 album–related article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
